timeline.message:
Fold RelationshipInterpreter into RelationshipTracker.

The extra inheritance just added extra complexity without
benefit and the child class actually referenced the parent
in one of the methods.

Note: This is a save-breaking changei. We can avoid that by
still keeping the parent class around but making it an empty
class.

timeline.bodyText: RelationshipTracker has 24 methods (exceeds 20 allowed). Consider refactoring.
timeline.author: codeclimate

replies.bodyText: IMHO, the split between the two classes is worse since the logic ends up being in two different places so is harder to look up.
replies.author: asvitkine

timeline.message: Restore serialVersionUID as the change is actually compatible.
Merge branch 'merge_rel' of https://github.com/asvitkine/triplea into merge_rel
